questions.question: What are the steps to enroll a Ukrainian child in a Romanian school or kindergarten?

When will an application for school enrollment be analyzed after submission?
How can students from Ukraine continue their higher education studies in Romania?
What is the process for obtaining equivalence or recognition of studies completed abroad in Romania?
What documents are required to set up a file for the recognition of completed studies in Romania?
When can a response be expected after submitting a complete file for study recognition?
How can the certificate of study recognition be obtained from the National Center for Diploma Recognition and Equivalence?
What specific support services, including accommodation and allowances, are available for Ukrainian minors under temporary protection in Romania?

What free courses and activities are offered for Ukrainian refugees, both adults and children, in Romania?
